name: Power Miners
summary:
Create your own Town of power miners! Merge and unlock new cool characters! Increase the production and your passive income! Build your town and earn more and more boosters! 
 
Upgrade your Miners, extend the Town, progress to the new undiscovered lands and Tap-Tap-Tap! 
 
Combine bonuses wisely to create a powerful boost to your mining Town. Manage your business effectively and earn offline!

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Power Miners: Merge & Build Tycoon Game
